author: cnbc.com
title: Oaktree Strategic Income posts 1Q profit
text:
LOS ANGELES (AP) _ Oaktree Strategic Income Corp. (OCSI) on Friday reported fiscal first-quarter earnings of $1.9 million.
On a per-share basis, the Los Angeles-based company said it had net income of 6 cents. Earnings, adjusted for investment costs, came to 15 cents per share.
The specialty finance company posted revenue of $10.7 million in the period.
Oaktree Strategic Income shares have dropped nearly 9 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has dropped 24 percent in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on OCSI at https://www.zacks.com/ap/OCSI
